title: The Witch-king, Deathless Lord (6P122)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow

Card Type:	Minion • Nazgul

Game Text:	Fierce. Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving a Nazgul, wound an ally twice or exert a companion.
Lore:	”'Dead? No, you cannot kill them.'”
